source_caption_data.pre_caption: A first-person POV shot, as if through the character’s eyes, moves along a narrow, paved residential street in a Japanese neighborhood on a sunny day. On the left, a silver minivan is parked in front of a house with a dark tiled roof and reddish-brown siding. Next to it, a white kei truck is parked in a driveway beside a wooden slat fence that borders a property with a prominent green tree. Traditional-style houses with tiled roofs line the street, some featuring solar panels. Further down the road, a light blue house is visible on the right. Power lines and poles run alongside the street, and in the distance, other houses and a red and white communications tower can be seen against a clear blue sky. Shadows are cast on the pavement, indicating the bright sunlight.
